column2: "The sample trees represent a collection from several studies: Vanninen et al. 1996, Mäkelä and Vanninen 1998, Vanninen and Mäkelä (1999,2000,2005). In all studies the sample trees were selected randomly from the composed stem freguency serie of each plot. The selection was futher targeted so that sampling targeted to trees representing dominant, intermediate and supressed trees. "
"was determined by measuring the stem radials, without bark, of  sampledicks  into four cardinal points at minimum accuracy of 1 mm"
"was measurend on the basis of comprehensive empirical biomass analysis, see method from Vanninen et al. 1996"
"Data consist from sample trees that are felled from 6 sites of southern Finland, sites represented fertile Myriillus site type and poor Calluna site-type according to Cajander 1949"
